verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:16
verses.text: And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:17
verses.text: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:18
verses.text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:19
verses.text: And if they were all one member, where were the body?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:20
verses.text: But now are they many members, yet but one body.
